release.action: Added the ability to specify the context name of a WAR that will be deployed.
Did some refactoring to avoid null pointer exceptions.
Added the ability to easily create an integration test for applications that don't use a database at all.
Added SQL execution before transaction and after transaction so it's directly available for the web application itself.
Added database generation by Hibernate session factory so you can use your annotated classes to generate your database.
Fixed the stopping of the JBoss container by changing the JNP port to 1299 since cargo is trying to stop it on that port.
Added the functionality to enable you to deploy multiple WAR, EAR or EJB files for a integration test.
Added the basic functionality to create a integration test in an easy way that actually works.
